name: lupin
description: Lupin. A swiss army knife for managing my own [GoHugo](https://gohugo.io) based website projects. Might be useful for others one day.
author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com>

scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push origin --all
scripts.release:major: standard-version --release-as major -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push origin --all
scripts.release:minor: standard-version --release-as minor -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" && git push origin --all
